channel.title: Pillars on Data Partnership | The International Consortium of Data Collaboratives
channel.description: Recent content in Pillars on Data Partnership | The International Consortium of Data Collaboratives

item.title: Legal
item.description: Template data sharing framework agreements and joint agreements between multiple organizations save time and resources.

item.title: Access
item.description: Transparent web-based system for soliciting project ideas from staff improves efficiency and efficacy of data partnerships.

item.title: Multi-Disciplinary Teams
item.description: Transparent web-based system for soliciting project ideas from staff improves efficiency and efficacy of data partnerships.

item.title: IT Architecture
item.description: Secure IT architecture and processes for transmitting, storing, accessing, and analysing data, as well as for coding collaboration, create economies of scale amongst Consortium members and provide assurance to data partners for responsible data use.

item.title: Data Partnership Management
item.description: A formal data partnership management system ensures value proposition for data partners is met.

item.title: Derived Data Products
item.description: Managed, accessible repositories for derived data products and algorithms to broaden Data Collaboratives impact.
